message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll take advantage of it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $9,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $9,000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to compromise.  $11,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go to $9,500, which is a fair price for both of us. Let me know if you're open to that.

Hi Bob, I understand that $9,500 is a good offer, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. Considering the value it holds, I'm thinking of a price of $10,800. This is a fair price considering the benefits you'll get from the product. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
